body_html:
@rafaelvalle:

broadcastable does not mean "same number of elements", but roughly: "can be made the same size by repeating along non-existing or one-sized dimensions".

The exact definition is given here:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/broadcasting.html

body:
@rafaelvalle:

broadcastable does not mean "same number of elements", but roughly: "can be made the same size by repeating along non-existing or one-sized dimensions".

The exact definition is given here:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/broadcasting.html
